name: AVCaptureDevice.DiscoverySession
desc: A query for finding and monitoring available capture devices.

items.name: devices
items.desc: An array of currently available devices matching the session’s criteria.

items.name: supportedMultiCamDeviceSets
items.desc: An array of sets of capture devices that you can use simultaneously in a multi-camera session.

items.name: default
items.desc: Returns the default device used to capture data of a given media type.

items.name: default
items.desc: Returns the default device for the specified device type, media type, and position.

items.name: AVCaptureDevice.Position
items.desc: Constants to specify the position of a capture device.

items.name: ct AVCaptureDevice.DeviceType
items.desc: Values identifying the capture device’s type.

items.name: AVCaptureDeviceWasConnected
items.desc: Posted when a new device becomes available.

items.name: AVCaptureDeviceWasDisconnected
items.desc: Posted when an existing device becomes unavailable.

items.name: devices
items.desc: Returns an array of the available capture devices on the system.

items.name: devices
items.desc: Returns an array of the devices able to capture data of a given media type.
